title: Fide Titles Approved!
content:
It gives us great pleasure to announce that Anell Maasdorp and Savannah Ahjum earned their FIDE titles as WCM (Womans Candidate Master). This was approved by FIDE after these players wonderful performance at the African School's Individuals that was held in Botswana. Well done both of you!

[gallery columns="2" size="medium" ids="8113,8112"]
